arcticLow: The partially eaten carcass of a mammoth, from which 1d4 weeks of rations can be harvested.
Single-file tracks in the snow that stop abruptly
A frozen pond with a jagged hole in the ice that appears recently made
1 orc Eye of Gruumsh and 2d8 orcs
arcticMid: A half-orc druid tending to an injured polar bear. If the characters assist the druid, she gives them a vial of antitoxin.
2d6 + 1 zombies aboard a galleon trapped in the ice. Searching the ship yields 2d20 days of rations.
1 bandit captain with 1 druid, 1d3 berserkers, and 2d10 + 5 bandits
1d4 hours of extreme cold (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide)
1 orc Eye of Gruumsh with 1d6 orogs and 2d8 + 6 orcs
A howl that echoes over the land for 1d3 minutes
arcticHigh: A blizzard that reduces visibility to 5 feet for 1d6 hours
A herd of 3d20 + 60 caribou (deer) moving through the snow
A mile-wide frozen lake in which preserved corpses of strange creatures can be seen
A crumbling ice castle littered with the frozen bodies of blue-skinned humanoids
arcticTop: A Circular patch of black ice on the ground. The air temperature around the patch is warmer than in the surrounding area, and characters who inspect the ice find bits of machinery frozen within.
An adventurer frozen 6 feet under the ice; 50% chance the corpse has a rare magic item of the DM's choice
A 500-foot-high wall of ice that is 300 feet thick and spread across 1d4 miles
1 ancient white dragon with 1d3 young white dragons
coastalLow: 1d4 ghouls feeding on corpses aboard the wreckage of a merchant ship. A search uncovers 2d6 bolts of ruined silk, a 50-foot length of rope. and a barrel of salted herring.
A few dozen baby turtles struggling to make their way to the sea
A momentary formation in the waves that looks like an enormous humanoid face
A lone hermit (acolyte) sitting on the beach contemplating the meaning of the multiverse
1 sahuagin priestess with 1d3 merrow and 2d6 sahuagin
coastalMid: A pseudodragon chasing gulls through the air
1 commoner singing a dirge (day only) or 1 banshee (night only)
A stoppered bottle containing an illegible note and half buried in the sand
A battle at sea between two galleons
A pirate crew consisting of 1 bandit captain, 1 druid, 2 berserkers, and 2d12 bandits, all searching for buried treasure
A severed humanoid hand tangled in a net
1 sahuagin baron with 1d3 sahuagin priestesses and 2d8 sahuagin
coastalHigh: A nest of 1d6 dragon turtle eggs
A trident partially buried in the sand
2d6 ghasts crawling over 1d6 wrecked ships and feeding on the dead

A beached whale, dead and bloated. If it takes any damage, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 5d6 bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one
coastalTop: An adult bronze dragon fighting an adult blue dragon to the death
1 adult bronze dragon or 1 adult blue dragon
1d6 + 2 waterspouts that dance on the water before stopping abruptly
desertLow: 2d6 commoners with 2d4 camels bound for a distant city
1d6 guards escorting a noble to the edge of the desert, all of them astride camels
Single-file tracks marching deeper into the desert
An oasis surrounded by palm trees and containing the remnants of an old camp
A brass lamp laying on the ground
1 gnoll pack lord with 1d3 giant hyenas
A pile of humanoid bones wrapped in rotting cloth
1 bandit captain with 1 druid and 3d6 bandits
